images.caption: Ghaston Grey castle. Illustration by Ignacio Bazan Lazcano \xc2\xa9 Fantasy Flight Games
Dorne and the location of Ghaston Grey

name: Ghaston Grey
summary: Ghaston Grey is a small bleak island in the Sea of Dorne. Its crumbling, old castle has been used by the Martells as a prison for the vilest of criminals and traitors,[1] who are sent there to waste away. It is considered a horrible place to be sent.[2]
